content: to knit in the round begin at underarm seam and pick up and knit 46 50 60 sts around armhole place marker for the beginning of the round work the first and last 3 1 2 st as knit sts then work in relief pattern decreasing first st on each side of the marker every fourth round 7 9 12 times beginning with the plain knit sts and eventually decreasing pattern sts 32 32 36 sts work even until sleeve measures 5 6 ½ 8 change to 2x2 ribbing and work eight rounds bind off repeat for other sleeve collar brown sheep company increase 100662 county road 16 mitchell ne 69357 800-826-9136 fax 308-635-2143 www brownsheep com brown sheep company increase pattern busy baby boy sweater & hat free designed exclusively for brown sheep company by lorna miser note sts are not picked up along the front bound off sts the collar must be knit to the width of this edge and then the side edges are overlapped and sewn to the bound off edge beginning at the right front neck edge pick up and knit 23 25 30 sts along the straight edge to the shoulder pick up one extra stitch in the corner and knit across the 26 back sts on the holder pick up one extra stitch in the corner and pick up and knit 23 25 30 sts along the left front edge down to the left center bound off stitches 74 78 88 sts working back and forth begin on a ws row as follows row 1 ws *k1 p1 repeat from * across row 2 *p1 k1 repeat from * across repeat these two row until collar measures 5 or the width of the center front bound off sts bind off loosely overlap left collar over right and sew both layers to bound off center front sts cut yarn weave in ends hat pattern preparing to knit in the round cast on 72 88 sts join being careful not to twist sts place marker for the beginning of the round work eight rounds in 2x2 ribbing following chart work in relief pattern until hat measures 4 5 from cast on end relief pattern crown decreases larger size only k9 k2tog 8 times 80 sts knit one round k8 k2tog 8 times 72 sts knit one round both sizes k7 k2tog 8 times 64 sts knit one round k6 k2tog 8 times 56 sts knit one round k5 k2tog 8 times 48 sts knit one round k4 k2tog 8 times 40 sts knit one round k3 k2tog 8 times 32 sts knit one round k2 k2tog 8 times 24 sts knit one round k1 k2tog 8 times 16 sts knit one round brown sheep company increase 100662 county road 16 mitchell ne 69357 800-826-9136 fax 308-635-2143 www brownsheep com brown sheep company increase pattern busy baby boy sweater & hat free designed exclusively for brown sheep company by lorna miser k2tog 8 times 8 sts
